title: Failsafe

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - During the day, choose to attempt to turn back time. If there is no hanging today, time will rewind until the beginning of the previous night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- During a rewinded night:
- All players who were killed since the beginning of the previous night are revived as if they had never died. Everything is restored, except for role/faction conversions.
- All non-townies are forced to make the same action they did the first time around. Newly converted players are unable to make any action.
- Whispers are able to be made.
- You may only rewind time two times.
- If both charges of your ability remain and you are killed, you will auto-use your ability from the grave, consuming both charges.

desc:
Post 1169
*Time is not safe from our grasp. But maybe that's a good thing.*
